xxl.core.util.metaData

Interface MetaDataProvider<M>

  • Type Parameters:
    M - the type of the meta data provided by objects implementing this interface.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MetaDataCursor<E,M>, MetaDataFunction<P,R,M>, MetaDataManageable<I,M>, MetaDataManagement<I,M>, MetaDataPredicate<P,M>, SweepArea<I,E>, SweepAreaImplementor<E>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMetaDataCursor, AbstractMetaDataFunction, AbstractMetaDataManagement, AbstractMetaDataPredicate, AbstractSAImplementor, AbstractSAImplementor.AbstractSAImplementorMetaDataManagement, AbstractSweepArea, AbstractSweepArea.AbstractSAMetaDataManagement, Aggregator, BagSAImplementor, BagSAImplementor.BagSAImplementorMetaDataManagement, CMDFunction, CountingSweepArea, CrossTableCursor, DecoratorSweepArea, DefaultMemoryManageableSA, DistinctMetaDataAggregationFunction, FunctionMetaDataFunction, GroupAggregator, HashSAImplementor, HashSAImplementor.HashSAImplementorMetaDataManagement, ImplementorBasedSweepArea, ImplementorBasedSweepArea.ImplementorBasedSAMetaDataManagement, InputStreamMetaDataCursor, LeftBind, ListSAImplementor, LoggingMetaDataCursor, Mapper, MemoryManageableSA, MergeSorter, MetaDataAggregationFunction, NestedLoopsDifference, NestedLoopsDistinct, NestedLoopsGrouper, NestedLoopsIntersection, NestedLoopsJoin, Orenstein, Orenstein.FloatPointKPEzCodeMapper, Orenstein.OrensteinSA, PlaneSweep.PlaneSA, PredicateMetaDataPredicate, Projection, Renaming, ResultSetMetaDataCursor, RightBind, Sampler, Selection, SortBasedDifference, SortBasedDistinct, SortBasedDivision, SortBasedGrouper, SortBasedIntersection, SortMergeEquiJoinSA, SortMergeJoin, SortMergeJoin.PredicateBasedSA, Union

    public interface MetaDataProvider<M>
    An interface that signals that an implementing class provides meta data information.
    See Also:
    MetaDataCursor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      M getMetaData()
      Returns the meta data information for this class.
